message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at the special price of $200.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget, but $120 is quite a bit below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I understand your perspective, but $160 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $140, but that's the highest I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
